NOTE 3 The ISO/IEC 19770 standard (multiple parts) provides an IT Asset management system for tracking software licenses. 2) Identify the attributes of configuration items. NOTE 1 Attributes refers to item status, or physical or logical features useful for managing or maintaining the software system.
